childhoods.name: Street Urchin
childhoods.description: You grew up on the streets, learning to survive through wit and quick fingers. The alleys were your home, and other outcasts your family.

childhoods.name: Noble Upbringing
childhoods.description: Born into privilege, you were tutored in etiquette, politics, and the arts. Your childhood was one of comfort, but also expectation and duty.

childhoods.name: Merchant Family
childhoods.description: Raised in a trading family, you learned the value of coin and conversation. You traveled to many places as a child, seeing diverse cultures.

childhoods.name: Farm Life
childhoods.description: You grew up working the land, rising with the sun and laboring until dusk. Hard work and simple pleasures defined your youth.

childhoods.name: Military Brat
childhoods.description: Your parent(s) served in the military, and you moved from garrison to garrison. You learned discipline and saw the cost of war early.

childhoods.name: Wilderness Survivor
childhoods.description: You grew up far from civilization, in the wilds. Nature was your teacher, and survival your daily lesson.

childhoods.name: Temple Ward
childhoods.description: Raised in a temple or monastery, you were taught in the ways of faith and devotion. Prayer and meditation were your daily routine.

childhoods.name: Artisan Apprentice
childhoods.description: From a young age, you apprenticed to a craftsperson, learning a trade with your hands. Creation and precision became second nature.

childhoods.name: Entertainer's Child
childhoods.description: Born into a troupe of performers, you learned to sing, dance, or act. Life was a constant performance, moving from town to town.

childhoods.name: Orphaned
childhoods.description: You lost your family young and had to fend for yourself. Whether in an orphanage or on your own, you learned self-reliance.

childhoods.name: Scholar's Protégé
childhoods.description: A learned individual took you under their wing, teaching you to read, write, and think critically. Books were your companions.

childhoods.name: Outcast
childhoods.description: For some reason—your ancestry, abilities, or circumstances—you were shunned by your community. Loneliness shaped your early years.

childhoods.name: Sailor's Youth
childhoods.description: You grew up on ships or by the sea, learning the ways of sailors and the ocean's moods. The water has always called to you.

childhoods.name: Gang Member
childhoods.description: You ran with a gang or thieves' guild as a youth, learning the codes of the underworld and how to watch your back.

childhoods.name: Magical Prodigy
childhoods.description: Your magical talents manifested early, and you received special training or were feared for your abilities. Magic has always been part of you.
